Reference is made to the meeting with the Secretary of the Ministry of Civil
Aviation (MoCA) on November 15,2023. During this meeting, it was decided to ensure
'100% staffing at X-BlS, frisking booths etc.
2. 
lt is informed that considering the upcoming Winter season and the expected
surge in passenger traffic at airports, after a series of meetings, 3082 CISF personnel
has been allotted to airports to cater to the requirement of manpower to effectively
address the anticipated congestion issues.
3. 
lt is noteworthy that higher authorities are deeply concerned about potential
congestion problems at airports. Consequently, it is imperative to ensure 100% staffing
of sanctioned X-ray Baggage lnspection System (XBIS) and Automatic Tray Retrieval
System (ATRS) machines at the Security Hold Area. lt is also requested to deploy an
adequate number of personnel at other important duty posts to facilitate the seamless
movement of passengers.
4. 
The management of manpower at the unit level will play a crucial role in handling
the increased passenger influx and preventing congestion at airports. This can be
achieved through the efficient deployment of available manpower.
5. 
ln light of the above, I have been directed to request all Zonal DlsG/AP and
DlsG/CASOs to take proactive measures which may inctude managing leave and
weekly offs of the personnel, implementing flexible shift, pulling out the personnel from
the lean duty posts, etc.
